name: Tappy-Alps
description:
Tappy-Alps is a casual, Tappy-Bird inspired Video Game. Use Left click to keep your plain in the air, and try not and collide into the Alps. The higher your score, the higher the speed and difficulty. 

What's your highest score? 

Made in a 48hr period

  • Daniel Oldham (Programmer) Portfolio: https://www.dangodev.com/ 
  • Artwork: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/tappy-plane
